name: Greater Los Angeles, California, United States

agencies.name: City of Los Angeles Department of Transportation
Los Angeles County Metropolitan Transportation Authority

records.notes: A Culver City bound Culver CityBus Route 1 bus was seen at Windward Ave & Main St in Venice.
A University of California, Los Angeles bound Big Blue Bus Rapid 12 bus was seen at Overland Ave & Venice Blvd in Palms.
[SPECIAL] A Downtown Los Angeles bound LA Metro Route 720 articulated bus was seen at Wilshire Blvd & S Ogden Dr in Mid-Wilshire. The bus was a LA Metro's normal vehicle, not a Metro Rapid one.
A Koreatown bound LA Metro Route 18 bus was seen at W 5th St & S Broadway in Downtown Los Angeles.
A Downtown Los Angeles bound LA Metro Route 53 bus was seen at W 5th St & S Spring St in Downtown Los Angeles.
A Koreatown bound LA Metro Route 18 bus was seen at W 5th St & S Spring St in Downtown Los Angeles, followed by a Downtown Los Angeles bound LA Metro Route 53 bus.
A Mid City bound LA Metro Route 30 bus, a Koreatown bound LA Metro Route 18 bus and a Downtown Los Angeles bound LA Metro Route 53 bus were seen at S Spring St & W 5th St in Downtown Los Angeles.
A Santa Monica bound LA Metro Route 720 articulated bus was seen at W 5th St & S Spring St in Downtown Los Angeles.
A South Park bound LADOT DASH Downtown Route D bus was seen at S Spring St & W 5th St in Downtown Los Angeles.
A Griffith Observatory bound LADOT DASH Observatory/Los Feliz bus was seen outside of Griffith Observatory.
A clockwise loop LADOT DASH Hollywood bus was seen at Franklin Ave & N Vermont Ave in Los Feliz.
A City Sightseeing Los Angeles open top double-decker was seen at Hollywood Blvd & N Highland Ave in Hollywood.
A Baldwin Hills bound LA Metro Route 217 bus was seen at Hollywood Blvd & N Cherokee Ave in Hollywood.
A Malibu bound LA Metro Route 534 bus was seen near Pacific Coast Hwy & S Topanga Canyon Blvd in Pacific Palisades.
An Oxnard bound Gold Coast Transit Route 6 bus was seen at N Ventura Ave & W Center St in Downtown Ventura.
